resources.string:
Hi, my name is Mahesh. 

I love chicken. 

The kind that is alive and roams around your poultry farm doing kwak kwak kwack. 

The fact that I love chickens is because they are very tasty 

I have never cooked a chicken till today to be honest. 

I don't think I can live without chickens 

I will be happy to show and make you eat some chickens made in my house
